scripts.build: mkdir dist; npm run build-standard; npm run build-min
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run commit-dist && git push -f origin release
scripts.commit-dist: git branch -D release; git checkout -b release && git add -f dist/ && git commit -am "Update dist for release"
scripts.postpublish: git checkout - && git branch -D release && git push --tags
